commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas851c335"

diff:
"851c335 Bug 396861: Need short libname for zipwriter on OS/2, r=ted.mielczarek, a=bzbarsky
diff --git a/modules/libjar/zipwriter/src/Makefile.in b/modules/libjar/zipwriter/src/Makefile.in
index 0ab79a6..db2a06a 100644
--- a/modules/libjar/zipwriter/src/Makefile.in
+++ b/modules/libjar/zipwriter/src/Makefile.in
@@ -44,6 +44,9 @@ include $(DEPTH)/config/autoconf.mk
 
 MODULE                = zipwriter
 LIBRARY_NAME          = zipwriter
+ifneq (,$(filter-out WINNT WINCE,$(OS_ARCH)))
+SHORT_LIBNAME         = zipwrite
+endif
 MODULE_NAME           = ZipWriterModule
 EXPORT_LIBRARY        = 1
 LIBXUL_LIBRARY        = 1
"
